Reviews.Content: arrived plaza ocean club hotel june 16th pleased price cleanliness hotel oceanview view ocean sand hotel close shopping restaurants staff helpful friendly time florida definately enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “LOVE THIS PLACE!!!”
Reviews.Author: mollymop12
Reviews.Content: husband stayed september 2010 pleased brought family 9 total 3 age 7 staff extremely friendly helpful sometimes joining awesome nephews close proximity beach shops boardwalk plus plan staying plaza ocean club future highly reccommend

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: daisy1990
Reviews.Content: worse hotels stayed service desk slow dated listen loud ac night restaurant cant food recommend

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay!”
Reviews.Author: nurselissa
Reviews.Content: live little south orlando booked 1pm minute getaway night booked online site dont name till pay deal didnt expect nice didnt expect decent view wrong 8th floor wonderful view balcony size family fit dh 3 kids hotel literally steps ocean pool kids loved spacious staying night family comfortable week highly suggest hotel

Reviews.Title: “Oceanside Fun”
Reviews.Author: BeachBumGolfer
Reviews.Content: nice hotel 3 rated pricelinecom staff helpful nice lobby nice elevators subpar nice refrig coffeemaker coffee dishes utensils oceanview price fantastic hotel little money upgrade time beach stay cost 5 day parking becoming par course daytona beach

Reviews.Title: “Used to be a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: porkchp
Reviews.Content: seen days elevators repaired lack maintenance overall doors dont close tightly nights maid service beds hard poorly slept floor pool cloudy dirty aint heated slip papers door day offering free gift offer time share demo parking 5 bucks day daytona dont understand petty parking else save bucks stay beach 50 bucks lot

Reviews.Title: “This is the poorest maintained hotel I have stayed in ever.”
Reviews.Author: maryc922
Reviews.Content: hotel major cleaning update hallway carpets dirty spotted dont sorry teenagers sitting hallway eating closet door bypassing mirrored doors track completely rusted towel rack bathroom including carpet shower morning feet dirty walking carpet mud bottom tub elevators arrived supposed day stay daytona hotel changed quickly hotel stay nor recommend else

Reviews.Title: “We had a great experience”
Reviews.Author: Ekimaseret
Reviews.Content: desk clerk exactly friendliest courteous professional clean smelled fresh ac nice pool heated clean towels provided comp continental breakfast nice touch restaurant bit overpriced wait staff wasnt exactly ball despite excellent experience stay

Reviews.Title: “Never again...”
Reviews.Author: kclark50
Reviews.Content: daytona stay friends fun spring break googled hotel impression nice clean classy looking 2 hotel advertise nicer stayed ocean plaza club dirty smelled bad gum floor maid didnt job cleaning gum bed employees rude tell hated thier jobs hated guests hotel breakfast buffet nasty priced ugh top charged extra 200 dollars stay gotten call strongly suggest staying

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay on Spring Break!”
Reviews.Author: kob1989
Reviews.Content: friends spent 6 nights plaza ocean club despite hour wait check check prime time didnt mind waiting vacations gone condition cleaning service job accommodating everyday atmosphere spring break experience staff hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Florida”
Reviews.Author: Suzanne34172
Reviews.Content: am impressed plaza ocean club hotel daytona beach florida coming hotel twice bike week biketoberfest walking familys home greeted name staff services provided outstanding questions concerns attended immediately hotel ocean view wonderful ocean morning sit watch sunrise choose balcony morning buffet delicious fresh servers tend front desk staff totally outstanding trip booked trips wouldnt stay else dont plan changes future happy home home thanks team

Reviews.Title: “Disaster in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: newhorizonsMontreal
Reviews.Content: late arrival airport greeted cockroaches dog barking moved dingy carpeting peeling moldy walls bathroom rusty bathtub worn sheets towels pigeon droppings covered balcony smell cigarette smoke water day broken pipes hotel staff deal building bad shape hotel major renovation

HotelInfo.Name: Plaza Ocean Club Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 640 North Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
